about_the_game: Pay a visit to the unique world of Sherlock Holmes Chapter One with this attractive digital artbook that encompasses a vast collection of concept art, drawings, sketches, and renders. This artbook was designed to give you an exclusive behind-the-scenes look into how we created the extraordinary world of Cordona and its intriguing characters.

content_descriptors.notes: The Artbook contains exploration of crime scenes, depiction of blood.
